name: Guardian Heroes
description:
Guardian Heroes is an action, arcade and fighting game developed by Treasure. It came out on 26-01-1996. It was published by SEGA. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Guardian Heroes on Xbox 360, PC and SEGA Saturn.
Hideki Matsutake, Katsuhiko Suzuki and Norio Hanzawa scored the game.
